mapper.update:
update
set GE_MUTILIBPHNEW_ID = #{GE_MUTILIBPHNEW_ID}, FCAPTION = #{FCAPTION}, FFILETYPE = #{FFILETYPE}, FGRADE = #{FGRADE}, FRUNFDS = #{FRUNFDS}, FRUNSTATE = #{FRUNSTATE}, FINALFDS = #{FINALFDS}, FOPERATOR = #{FOPERATOR}, FEXECUT_TIME = #{FEXECUT_TIME}, PRO_BATCH_NO = #{PRO_BATCH_NO}, FIS_END = #{FIS_END}, FIFQUALIFIDE = #{FIFQUALIFIDE}, FIFCREATE = #{FIFCREATE}, DOCUMENTTEMPLATE_ID = #{DOCUMENTTEMPLATE_ID}, FSTENCIL_NAME = #{FSTENCIL_NAME}, TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID = #{TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID}, PLAN_ID = #{PLAN_ID}, RUN_PH_ID = #{RUN_PH_ID}, RUN_UP_ID = #{RUN_UP_ID}, RUN_O_ID = #{RUN_O_ID}, RUN_P_ID = #{RUN_P_ID}, FCREATOR = #{FCREATOR}, CREATE_TIME = #{CREATE_TIME}, FEXTEND1 = #{FEXTEND1}, FEXTEND2 = #{FEXTEND2}, FEXTEND3 = #{FEXTEND3}, LAST_MODIFIER = #{LAST_MODIFIER}, LAST_MODIFIED_TIME = #{LAST_MODIFIED_TIME}, RUN_FINAL_INSPECT_ID = RUN_FINAL_INSPECT_ID where RUN_FINAL_INSPECT_ID = #{RUN_FINAL_INSPECT_ID}
